name: RamsFan

skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: rams fan
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Get unofficial to-the-minute stats & fun facts on the Rams by Fresh Digital Group. This skill isn’t sponsored or endorsed by the Rams.

Here’s some ways you can use the skill. We have given you many different ways for you to talk to Alexa:



General Updates:


Alexa, ask Rams Fan how are the Rams doing? 

Alexa, ask Rams Fan who do the Rams play next?

Alexa, ask Rams Fan Jared Goff (or any player's First name, Last name) touchdown update. 



Fun Facts about the Rams:


Alexa, ask Rams Fan to tell me some trivia about the Rams. 

Alexa, ask Rams Fan how many Super Bowls have the Rams won?
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
